definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
at the minimum/at the very least
standard weight (used on a balance scale)
to ratchet up/to raise (expectations etc)/to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc)/to up the ante/(computing) to encode

sentences.english: Lastly, we designed coding plan of internal code of full information for mongolian information processing system.
sentences.chinese: 最後設計出了蒙古文信息處理全息內部碼的編碼方案。

sentences.english: I am pleased to inform that invitation code is no longer needed.
sentences.chinese: 很高興告訴大家，現在不再需要邀請碼了。

sentences.english: How to test the invitation code to get ah?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼樣才能獲得測試的邀請碼啊？

sentences.english: We can only supply you with 20000 yards of pure silk.
sentences.chinese: 咱們只能供給二萬碼的僞絲綢。

sentences.english: This is Yuli's recommendation to all foreign Chinese learners.
sentences.chinese: 這是尤里同學向外國漢字教學者推薦和碼漢字學習法。

sentences.english: Increased the range of leatherworking drums to 40 yards.
sentences.chinese: 制皮製皮的戰鼓作用範圍增加到40碼。

sentences.english: If you do this, you will earn the level's cheat code.
sentences.chinese: 如果你這樣做，你就賺了水平的金手指碼。

sentences.english: Returns a hashcode for this socket address.
sentences.chinese: 返回該套接字地址的hash碼。

sentences.english: The old camera was so craptastic that I had to buy a digital one.
sentences.chinese: 那個舊的相機太垃圾了，我得買個數碼的。

sentences.english: Are policy makers ready to do what it takes to break this vicious circle?
sentences.chinese: 決策者們準備採取措施打破這種惡性循環碼？

sentences.english: We note that you want additional samples of 5 yards per color way to be dispatched by air.
sentences.chinese: 獲悉貴方另要求航寄色位各5碼樣品，這是可以的。

sentences.english: The only proviso is that the bytecode modifications should be deterministic and predictable.
sentences.chinese: 惟一的要求是字節碼修改應該是確定性的且可預測的。

sentences.english: You even run brandnew virus updates and signatures on the box, just to be sure.
sentences.chinese: 你確定你也升級了病毒庫及特徵碼。

sentences.english: Change the current market, anti-theft devices are generally fixed code deficiencies.
sentences.chinese: 改變了目前市場上普遍防盜器均採用固定碼的缺陷。

sentences.english: They should be able to score from 12 yards.
sentences.chinese: 他們應該能從12碼的位置射門得分。

sentences.english: But the track seemed to vanish a hundred yards from where I stood.
sentences.chinese: 但是在我所站的地方一百碼之外，小路似乎消失了。

definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
